The reason why the chord and notes are highlighted with the same color is
because they are on the same level in the page structure.
Generally chords and notes are considered as sound units(or just units) in Unison.
And as you will learn further in the documentation it's important to
assosiate chords and notes with the same color when we are trying
to set positions for other elements.
